name: HoneywellLock
0:
”Alexa,lock the front door”
”Alexa,lock my front door”
”Alexa,lock front door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hardware Requirements:
1. Honeywell smart Lock
2. gateway hub - sold separately
3. Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Check that the Honeywell Lock app is able to lock using Bluetooth.

2. Check that the Honeywell Lock app is able to “remotely” lock using the gateway hub

3. Enable the Honeywell Lock skill in Alexa

4. Link the Honeywell Lock account and provide permission to access your locks.

5. Once Alexa discovers the Honeywell smart Lock, you can issue voice commands to Alexa as outlined below:

Alexa, lock the front door
(front door is the name of smart lock,you can rename the smart lock in the Honeywell Lock app)
